content.rendered:
Podcasts related to Genesis or created by the Genesis community.

OfficeHours.fm

Now with an official remit covering topics outside of Genesis too (apparently there are some), Carrie Dils’ OfficeHours.fm podcast (originally Genesis Office Hours) has been entertaining and informing the Genesis community and beyond since March 2014.

http://officehours.fm/

UK Genesis Podcast

Ben Furfie and Gary Jones host their regular UK Genesis Podcast featuring members of the UK Genesis community since February 2015. Because (UK) awesome.

http://ukgenesis.co.uk/podcasts/

Got a podcast that you think should be included here? Let me know.
